fields_of_interest: Competition, Consumers, Customs, Taxation, Single market, Transport
eu_initiatives:
Travel & Tourism industry 
Package Travel Directive 
Health & Safety at tourist establishments
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
AITO is the Association for independent and specialist holiday companies. Our member companies, usually owner managed, strive to create overseas holidays with high levels of professionalism and a shared concern for quality and personal service. 
The Association promotes the unique range of its members holidays and encourages the highest standards in all aspects of tour operating. It insists on financial protection for all customers holidays, provides services for its members and represents their interests to government, industry and the media.
